response.overview: ESPN brings you an extraordinary tribute to the seventy-five people who lost their lives on November 14, 1970, in what was perhaps one of the most catastrophic tragedies in NCAA history. What began as a routine flight home ended in disaster when the aircraft carrying the Marshall University football team, its coaches, fans, and flight crew crashed in Wayne County, West Virginia, killing everyone on board. Featuring eyewitness interviews, this unforgettable documentary tells the real story of those who were lost, their stricken mourners, and the legacy that was left for Marshall University.
response.tagline: Discover the true story behind the inspirational Hollywood film release.
response.title: Remembering Marshall
